text: West India Quay is a Docklands Light Railway (DLR) station in Poplar, London, England. It serves the West India Quay quarter and is close to Canary Wharf. The station is near the boundary between the Isle of Dogs and Tower Hamlets and is in the East End of London. The station is in Travelcard Zone 2. Category:Docklands Light Railway stations Category:Railway stations in the London Borough of Tower Hamlets
title: West India Quay DLR station
